name: Isolation (itch) (lew, iArctic)
description:
WARNING -  If the WebGL version of the game has extremely low FPS or is not loading, Make sure your browser has 'Hardware Acceleration' enabled:

Made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2

Made by Lew,  iArctic

In Isolation, you are an explorer stranded far from Earth. Your Only Mission... Get Home.

Explore a Vast, Open Galaxy with Planets, Resources and Inhabitants that may of may not want to kill you. Gather Fuel and Gold Nuggets to buy upgrades from these Strange Species to help you achieve your goal. 

Controls INPUTControlW
S
SpaceBar
Mouse Position
Mouse ClickMove Ship Forward
Move Ship Backwards
Boost
Rotate
Shoot Mechanics / Features
  • Farming Planets
  • Friendly Aliens / Vendor
  • Enemies
  • Black Holes
